http://code.google.com/p/javahotel/source/browse/trunk/examples/sequence/sequences/seqavharm.h

Assume a  and b > 0.

Launching command:
```
 SequenceCommand *com = createCommand(SEQGEOAR,1,98);

 SequenceEngine::runSequence(com,100);
```
